data.name: InstallationErrorText
data.value: Something went wrong, please try again.

data.name: InstallationSourceDescription_MobiDocs
data.value: Advanced text editor fully compatible with Office 365

data.name: InstallationSourceDescription_MobiOffice
data.value: A complete pack of easy-to-use office suite apps

data.name: InstallationSourceDescription_MobiPDF
data.value: Read, create, edit, combine, and export PDFs in one app

data.name: InstallationSourceDescription_MobiSheets
data.value: Robust spreadsheet creator for visualizing and analyzing data

data.name: InstallationSourceDescription_MobiSlides
data.value: Dynamic presentation tool and slideshow editor

data.name: AddButtonText
data.comment: Adds an optional module to OfficeSuite

data.name: CancelInstallMessage
data.value: Cancelling will stop the installation and the app will not be installed.
data.comment: Shown when the user closes the app during an installation. Additionally "Are you sure you want to exit" is shown 2 lines above this text

data.name: QuitInstallerDialogMessage
data.value: If you quit now, the app will not be installed.
data.comment: Shown when the user closes the app before any installation has started. Additionally "Are you sure you want to exit" is shown 2 lines above this text

data.name: ExitConfirmationMessage
data.value: Are you sure you want to exit?
data.comment: Part of two messageboxes, shown on first line of the message box with the rest of the text following two lines below this one

data.name: PreparingInstallationText
data.comment: #FORREVIEW TextBlock text letting the user know installation has not started yet and there are several steps needed to be done before installation starts

data.name: NotAllInstallationsSelected_StartText
data.value: Wait, you’re missing out on free tools!
data.comment: #FORREVIEW Start text in a warning dialog about not all installations being selected.

data.name: NotAllInstallationsSelected_MobiPDFText
data.value: Manage PDFs with our all-in-one tool.
data.comment: #FORREVIEW MobiPDF text in a warning dialog about not all installations being selected.

data.name: NotAllInstallationsSelected_MobiDocsText
data.value: Seamless document editing at your fingertips.
data.comment: #FORREVIEW MobiDocs text in a warning dialog about not all installations being selected.

data.name: NotAllInstallationsSelected_MobiSheetsText
data.comment: #FORREVIEW MobiSheets text in a warning dialog about not all installations being selected.

data.name: NotAllInstallationsSelected_MobiSlidesText
data.comment: #FORREVIEW MobiSlides text in a warning dialog about not all installations being selected.

data.name: NotAllInstallationsSelected_EndText
data.value: Are you sure you want to proceed?
data.comment: #FORREVIEW End text in a warning dialog about not all installations being selected.

data.name: PreparingUpdate
data.comment: #FORREVIEW Label indicating the packaged application is updating

data.name: ProgressPercent
data.comment: #FORREVIEW Label indicating the progress of a package installation

data.name: InstallationSourceDescription_MobiDrive
data.value: Cloud storage solution for easy file management and sharing

data.name: InstallationSourceDescription_MobiMail
data.value: Secure and user-friendly email client and calendar

data.name: NotAllInstallationsSelected_MobiMailText
data.comment: #FORREVIEW MobiMail text in a warning dialog about not all installations being selected.

data.name: NotAllInstallationsSelected_MobiDriveText
data.value: Effortless file organization and access in the cloud.
data.comment: #FORREVIEW MobiDrive text in a warning dialog about not all installations being selected.
